title: About Plenti
description: Plenti is a minimalist JAMstack framework that's flexible and easy to use.
We've cut out as many dependencies as possible so you can focus on being productive instead of wrestling with a complicated toolchain.
The Svelte frontend cuts weight so users get a snappy experience, even with bad internet connections or underpowered devices.
The Go backend cuts wait so apps build faster allowing devs to get more done and editors to get realtime feedback on content changes.
author: Jim Fisk
